name: Promotion Class: Conqueror
description:
Role: Melee Control

Usually known for recklessness, this thoughtful warrior knows the key to winning a fight is to hamper and control your opponents.

Stat Adjustments:
Attack Power +150
Movement Control Intensity +21%

Traits Granted:
Axe Mastery
Mace Mastery

Enhancements:
Whirlwind: Now immune to crowd control while channeling.
Neck Slash: Now applies Suppression.
Berserk: Now escapes active crowd control and grants crowd control immunity.


WARNING: Purchasing this talent promotes you to the Conqueror promotion class and prevents access to the Battle Rager and Titan promotion classes.
